properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Humble yourselves
Under God's mighty hand,
So that He will lift you up.
Humble yourselves
Under God's mighty hand,
So that He will lift you up.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Open your hearts
To the Lord your God,
And know His love for you.
Open your hearts
To the Lord your God,
And know His love for you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Humble yourselves
under God's mighty hand,
so that He will lift you up.
Humble yourselves
under God's mighty hand,
so that He will lift you up.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I bow down
Before You, my Lord.
I bow down
Before You, my Lord.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Cast all anxiety
On Him,
Because He cares for You.
